**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface NavigationItemHookResult
```

## Properties

| Property                                                             | Modifiers | Type                                                                                                | Description                                                                                                                                     |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [isAvailable](./extensions.navigationitemhookresult.isavailable.md)  |           | boolean                                                                                             | Indicates the visibility of the item in the navigation menu and determines whether its corresponding page is available.                         |
